The '''2×2 crafting grid''' is used for basic [[crafting]], using a subset of the possible crafting [[recipes]]. The 2×2 grid is accessed inside the player's [[inventory]] (opened by pressing {{key|E}} by default).

<div style="display:inline-block;"> {{Inventory Table
|A1= Oak Log; Spruce Log; Birch Log; Jungle Log; Acacia Log; Dark Oak Log; Mangrove Log; Cherry Log; Pale Oak Log; Block of Bamboo; Crimson Stem; Warped Stem
|Output= Oak Planks, 4; Spruce Planks, 4; Birch Planks, 4; Jungle Planks, 4; Acacia Planks, 4; Dark Oak Planks, 4; Mangrove Planks, 4; Cherry Planks, 4; Pale Oak Planks, 4; Bamboo Planks, 2; Crimson Planks, 4; Warped Planks, 4
}} </div> <div style="display:inline-block;"> {{Inventory Table
|A1= Matching Planks
|B1= Matching Planks
|A2= Matching Planks
|B2= Matching Planks
|Output= Crafting Table
}} </div>

There is a limited number of recipes that can be made in the 2×2 grid. Therefore, it is typically used to craft [[logs]] into [[planks]] and then turn those planks into a [[crafting table]]. It can also be used to [[Item repair|combine]] damaged tools into a repaired tool. The crafting table (and by extension the [[crafter]]) offers a far greater variety of recipes with its 3×3 crafting grid, so it is usually used instead.

This page contains a list of blocks and items that can be crafted using the 2×2 crafting grid.

The list below is ordered based on the order of items in {{el|BE}} as of [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.114]]. On {{el|JE}}, there is no fixed order of blocks and items in the [[recipe book]] crafting menu.
